title: Arcade Miss Fortune joins the game

I was looking at a link that someone posted about the Yasuo PVE skin, and it got me thinking how cool it would be, if more champs were made that played some instrument for example the Pentakill skin team. It would be pretty cool if when you pressed /dance at the exact same time they would play a full song. I think that would be pretty cool having that added in for the fun of it!
It was {{champion:45}}, seen here: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/08/813-pbe-update.html#more

WHERE IS GNAR
I just want to say thank you Riot for releasing the new skin for this patch right away instead of waiting a few weeks and listing the skin as "unavailable" during the interim.
